rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0001
rows.name: Now then, let's discuss that training assignment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0002
rows.name:
We've decided to start you out on a probe installation,
just to get your feet wet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0003
rows.name: I guess we should back up a bit—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0004
rows.name:
here in New LA, we're using a
specialized computer system called FrontierNav[ST:page p1=120 ]to help us deploy a sensor grid across Mira—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0005
rows.name:
a network of data probes that allows us to monitor conditions
and collect all kinds of information about the planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Expanding that grid and filling in the blind spots
is one of BLADE's highest priorities.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0006_2
rows.name: Here, take a look at this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0007
rows.name:
What you're seeing on-screen is a terrain map
that includes New LA and the surrounding landmass.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0008
rows.name:
As you can see, we've divided the area
into a series of hexagonal blocks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0009
rows.name:
We call these blocks "segments,"
and together, they form our grid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0010
rows.name:
We determined this was the most efficient pattern,
given the limited range of our probes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0011
rows.name:
Based on it, we know exactly where we need
the probes to go—now we just have to install them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0012
rows.name: The sooner the better, as far as I'm concerned.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0013
rows.name:
The FrontierNav probes can also detect
the general locations of living things in the vicinity,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0014
rows.name:
which comes in handy if we need to
track down a BLADE or another citizen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0015
rows.name: Yes, quite handy indeed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0016
rows.name:
So, for this first exercise you'll be heading here—
to that white segment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0017
rows.name:
Go there, install the data probe,
and then come back home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0018
rows.name: Got it. East of the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0019
rows.name:
In that case, we can take the east gate
out of the administrative district, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0020
rows.name: We should be there in no time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0023
rows.name:
I'll leave the details on the data probe
installation procedure to you, Elma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0024
rows.name: Of course, Mr. Secretary.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0025
rows.name: All right, you two—shall we?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020100_MSG0026
rows.name:
Yeah! Training or not,
let's go install the HELL outta that probe![ST:wait ]
